alert.note: Alert for Berkshire; Hampden (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 16 at 9:59AM EDT until July 17 at 11:13AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...West Branch Farmington River At New Boston. * WHEN...From this morning to late tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.2 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.2 feet on 03/12/1936. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood New Boston && West Br Farmington New Boston Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Sun 9 am: 7.7 Forecast: Sun 2 pm 11.0 Sun 8 pm 10.3 Mon 2 am 8.7 Mon 8 am 7.6 &&
